name: Maybe Pong (UE5)
description:
A simple pong like game with alternative rules, made with Unreal Engine 5 on stream.
You can watch the streams on twitch https://www.twitch.tv/jangames (in Spanish)
Or you can watch the archive here https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCclnZvshagJftsmUZ2panCA

How to play
Press play to start or restart the ball
Escape to close the game
Use A/D to move
